title: 多人游戏朋友退出后主机弹错
author: lancerdk
txt_content:
和朋友双人联机，每次朋友退出游戏之后我的游戏也会卡死，然后弹出错误窗口，下面的内容是错误报告，希望哪位大大帮看看是什么情况~
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// You're mean.

Time: 13-2-21 下午11:00
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.AbstractMethodError: eg.getPlayer()Lqx;
        at cg.b(TcpConnection.java:466)
        at iv.d(NetServerHandler.java:74)
        at iw.b(NetworkListenThread.java:57)
        at bec.b(IntegratedServerListenThread.java:108)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.r(MinecraftServer.java:703)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.q(MinecraftServer.java:599)
        at bdz.q(IntegratedServer.java:170)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:497)
        at fy.run(SourceFile:849)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
